page.title: 16Clubs in Pembury
page.content: There are a lot of organisations active in Pembury. As many as 55 are listed in the village news letter and in the library. These include the {Horticultural Society, the Darby and {Joan Club, the Women's Institute}and many others. The{WRVS}are now in their third year. Every Wednesday between 24 and 30 elderly or disabled people are served with lunch in the village hall. They also run a meals on wheels service, taking dinners from the school kitchen to the people's homes. The{Pembury footpath walkers}are active, with a monthly walk. Their last walk was a 10 mile hike to Brenchley. The{Pembury Society}and the {Parish council}have been active encouraging the way-marking and clearing of many footpaths.
